content.rendered:
OVER 200,000 SNARES PRESENT IN
PROTECTED AREAS OF VIETNAM

Help us keep our forests snares free!

[row_inner_3 visibility=”show-for-small”] [col_inner_3 span__sm=”12″]
[/col_inner_3] [/row_inner_3]

Join us to make an even greater impact for wildlife!

OUR SPECIAL GIFTS

Sustainable Raincoat

Donate: $6.25

 

With the design facilitating comfort while wearing, the Sustainable Raincoat uses honeycomb fabric – an environment friendly material, not only retains the durability, but also does not cause the odor while using.

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

Wildlife board game

Donate: $12.68

 

Send your loved ones a special message with our wildlife cards. Each card features a beautiful animal design and the proceeds go towards protecting wildlife.

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

WildAct Face mask

Donate: $2

 

Masks printed with wild animals, made from fabric and can be reused many times. The strap can be adjusted to fit the face.

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

Bucket Hat

Donate: $4.5

 

Made of 65/35 cotton khaki fabric, color yellow with the WildAct logo printed on, along with straps and draw buttons.

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

Tote Bag

Donate: $4.5

 

Tote bag with WildAct logo in 2 sides, color charcoal blue, 65cm long handle with zipper. The bag is 38cm and 36cm long, convenient to take to work, school, or go out.

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

Key Rings

Donate: $1

 

Get a cute and eco-friendly key ring made from recycled materials. Each key ring features a different animal and helps raise awareness for wildlife conservation.

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

Student Notebook

Donate: $1

 

Our student notebooks are perfect for young wildlife enthusiasts. They feature fun animal designs and are made from sustainable materials.

 

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT

Animal Sticker

Donate: $0.25

 

Stickers have sharp images of different wild animals, water-resistant, scratch-resistant, UV-resistant and durable, can stick to hard materials such as metal, stone, glass, leather, acrylic,…

 

I CHOOSE THIS GIFT
